title: Throwing knife

properties.name: description
properties.value: Throwing knives are a type of members Ranged throwing weapon. They can be poisoned and can be wielded with shields or god books for protection.

content:
The RuneScape Wiki also has an article on: rsw:Throwing knifeThe RuneScape Classic Wiki also has an article on: classicrsw:Throwing knife
Throwing knife
AmmunitionThrown
Two handed?No
Attack speed

Throwing knives are a type of members Ranged throwing weapon. They can be poisoned and can be wielded with shields or god books for protection.

Throwing knives can be created via the Smithing skill, with the exception of black and dragon knives. Each bar will produce 5 throwing knives of the corresponding metal.

Throwing knives are among the fastest weapons in the game (along with darts), and are commonly used for PKing or training Ranged. They have an attack range of 4 tiles, 6 if using longrange.

  • 2 Throwing knives
